shareUrl.tooltipMessage: Share the page link with your colleagues. Be aware that your colleague needs to have the correct access rights to view the page.
shareUrl.successMessage: Link copied to clipboard. Be aware that your colleague needs to have the correct access rights to view the page.

resetTable.tooltip: Reset table to its default settings

additionalInformation.title: Additional Information
additionalInformation.selectionHint: Please select an element from the hierarchy on the left that has at least one sub-element below to view these details.

calculations.pcmRowHint: PCM materials are calculations only without relevant production information

unsupportedBrowser.title: Your browser is not supported
unsupportedBrowser.message: CDBA does not support your browser. Some features might not work properly. Please use the latest versions of Chrome or Microsoft Edge. Contact your IV coordinator if you need support/ admin rights to install a new browser.

drawings.title: Drawing: {{material}}
drawings.noDrawingsText: Unfortunately, we couldn't find a technical drawing for this product. As an alternative, you can find technical drawings inside SAP using the transaction CDESK.
drawings.upcomingPreviewFeatureTeaserMessage: Preview of the technical drawing is still under construction. We’re actively working on this feature, meanwhile you are able to download them from the table below.

languageSelect.label: Select language
languageSelect.hint: Please select the language for the application

localizationSelect.label: Select localization
localizationSelect.hint: Affects number separators and date format
localizationSelect.tooltip:
Example German localization:
Dates: 22.01.2021, Large numbers: 2.893,32€

Example US localization:
Dates: 01/22/2021, Large numbers: 2,893.32€

http.errorInterceptorMessageDefault: We are experiencing server problems. Please try again later.

hints.default: Please contact Service Now if you have any questions about your user roles or need access to additional user roles.
hints.missingRoles: If you need additional support on how to get access to the necessary rights please visit Product lines overview for further guidance. If you don’t know how to change your role assignments please visit How do role assignments work. After the approval of the rights please note that it takes up to one day to synchronize.

noBasicAccess.heading: No access to CDBA
noBasicAccess.message: We are sorry, you don’t have access to this application

noFeatureAccess.heading: Forbidden page
noFeatureAccess.message:
We are sorry, you don’t have access to this page or material.
You are missing subregion or product line rights.

descriptiveRolesMissing.heading: Missing Roles
descriptiveRolesMissing.message:
We are sorry, you are still missing required user roles to use CDBA.
You need at least one sub region role and one product line role.
